Body: Possible Duplicate:  Will factory resetting my device remove the Android upgrade?  I have read over other people's questions and happened to stumble upon someone whose device had downgraded back to Gingerbread when they did a factory reset it. Will that happen to my tablet since I have an Android tablet and am looking to reset it also?
Title: Will my Android device change to Gingerbread when I factory reset it?

history.Text: I have read over other peoples questions and happened to stumble upon someone who 's device had turned to Gingerbread instead of Android when they did a factory reset it,will that happen to my tablet since i have an Android tablet and am looking to reset it also?   Thanx for reading
Will my Android tablet change to Gingerbread when I factory reset it?
